Chnh Sch Thanh Ton

Phng Thc Thanh Ton

Thanh Ton Khi Nhn Hng (COD)

  • Thanh ton bng tin mt khi nhn hng
  • Kim tra sn phm trc khi thanh ton
  • Min ph ph thanh ton
  • p dng cho tt c n hng

Chuyn Khon Ngn Hng

  • Chuyn khon qua Internet Banking
  • Chuyn khon ti ATM
  • Min ph ph chuyn khon
  • Xc nhn n hng nhanh chng

Th Tn Dng/Ghi N

  • Visa, Mastercard, JCB
  • Th ATM ni a
  • Thanh ton trc tuyn an ton
  • H tr tr gp 0% li sut

V in T

  • MoMo, ZaloPay, ViettelPay
  • Thanh ton nhanh chng
  • Bo mt cao
  • Nhn m gim gi c bit
{/* Bank Accounts */}

Thng Tin Ti Khon Ngn Hng

{/* Installment Plans */}

Chng Trnh Tr Gp

Ph Bin

Tr Gp 0% Li Sut

  • p dng cho sn phm t 3.000.000
  • K hn: 3, 6, 9, 12 thng
  • Th tc n gin, duyt nhanh
  • Khng cn chng minh thu nhp

Tr Gp Li Sut Thp

  • Li sut t 0.8%/thng
  • K hn: 6, 12, 18, 24 thng
  • p dng cho tt c sn phm
  • H tr t cc ngn hng i tc

Tr Gp Qua Th Tn Dng

  • Chia nh ha n trn th
  • Li sut theo quy nh ngn hng
  • Thanh ton t ng hng thng
  • Khng cn th tc phc tp
{/* Security */}

Bo Mt Thanh Ton

M Ha SSL

Tt c thng tin thanh ton c m ha SSL 256-bit

PCI DSS

Tun th tiu chun bo mt quc t PCI DSS

3D Secure

Xc thc 3D Secure cho th tn dng

OTP

Xc thc OTP qua SMS cho giao dch

{/* Refund Policy */}

Chnh Sch Hon Tin

Hon Tin Trong 7 Ngy

  • Sn phm cha s dng, cn nguyn vn
  • Cn y ph kin v ha n
  • Khng c du hiu s dng
  • Hon tin 100% gi tr sn phm

Hon Tin Sau 7 Ngy

  • p dng cho sn phm li t nh sn xut
  • C giy xc nhn t trung tm bo hnh
  • Hon tin hoc i sn phm mi
  • Min ph vn chuyn
